text: 12.36 Part 4(e) requires off-site affordable housing contributions to allow the same level of accessibility to local infrastructure and services as if they were delivered on-site. Development proposals will be required to demonstrate this through submitting a detailed comparison of available infrastructure on-site and with the off-site location and should include as a minimum an assessment of: Public Transport Accessibility Level (PTAL) scores, availability, proximity, and capacity of services such as medical centres, retail, and community facilities.
